title: Drag Strip
description: The Philadephia Inquirer named Nancy Bartholomew's first Sierra Lavotini novel, The Miracle Strip , one of the year's best mysteries and Romantic Times calls Sierra "a magnificent, take-no-prisoners heroine."Now, the exotic dancer again proves herself a pro as she strips down to her G-string and searches for a killer...The only thing hotter than the supercharged engines at the Dead Lakes Motor Speedway is the special appearance by Sierra and her friend Ruby Diamond. But before the day ends, Sierra will be pinched black and blue, seeing red when she spots her cop-boyfriend kissing another woman-and shocked white when she stumbles upon Ruby's dead body. Now, to catch a killer, Sierra must risk her hide and-even more dangerous- expose her vulnerable heart...
author: Nancy Bartholomew
